Description: Fragment of foot of probably Attic black-glazed, stamped pottery bowl; tall ring foot with grooved resting surface. Wholly glazed; five unlinked stamped palmettes on floor. Incised inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 609)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1799)
